source.name: HAX1base: Mutation registry for Severe congenital neutropenia (Kostmann disease)

transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_006118.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000328703.12. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.
